document.full_text: nato must increase cooperation with pakistan to ensure a long-term solution to the afghan conflict, despite the killing of osama bin laden on pakistani soil, the military alliance's chief said wednesday.
document.title: nato chief: need to step up pakistan cooperation
lines_and_colors: nato must increase cooperation with pakistan to ensure a long-term solution to the afghan conflict, despite the killing of osama bin laden on pakistani soil, the military alliance's chief said wednesday.
